desc: Combine comfort, function, and fashion for sports and every day with Ponya's absorbent moisture-wicking bamboo-lined sweatbands, non-slip headbands, and athletic accessories that simply stay put so you don't have to. our bands are perfect for every day or running, crossfit, scuba diving and everything in between .

layout.text: Sign up for our newsletter for a discount on your first Ponya Bands purchase!
